content: 5mm needles us7 cast on 3 stitches knit 7 row at the end of the last row do not turn work but rotate 90 degrees pick up and knit 3 stitches one in each garter ridge rotate 90 degrees clockwise again and knit three stitches in the cast on edge 9 sts this is a garter stitch tab there are many youtube videos showing how this is worked should you struggle set up row ktb k1 p5 k1 ktb
